title: Decide the extent of the proposal of Development Plan / Regional plan with respect to S
clause_text: Decide the extent of the proposal of Development Plan / Regional plan with respect to S.No. / Gut No. / CTS No. / Block No. / Barrack No. / Unit No., where boundaries shown on Development Plan / Regional plan varies with the boundaries as per revenue record / measurement plan / City Survey sheets etc. Determine and establish the location of zonal boundaries in cases of doubt or controversy;
section: Qualification and Competence of the Architect / Licensed Engineer / Structural Engineer / Town Planner / Supervisor

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
